definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Where did you learn to recite like that?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里学习的这样诵读？

sentences.english: He is dyslexic and a college dropout.
sentences.chinese: 他有诵读困难症，还是一名大学退学生。

sentences.english: Children with dyslexia have a difficult time learning to read and write in a typical classroom setting.
sentences.chinese: 诵读困难的孩子无法在传统的教室环境中学习读和写。
诵读困难是一种“无法预知”的学习障碍。

sentences.english: One common issue is whether there is special schooling that is available for dyslexics.
sentences.chinese: 一个共同的问题是，是否有特殊的教育是供诵读困难。

sentences.english: Next, we are bringing the ancient poetry reciting "Spring Dawn".
sentences.chinese: 下面给大家带来古诗诵读《春晓》。

sentences.english: This just means divine reading in Latin.
sentences.chinese: 意思就是用拉丁文诵读圣经。

sentences.english: Dyslexia is far more common than people believe.
sentences.chinese: 诵读困难症远比人们想象的要普遍得多。

sentences.english: Bible Reading Campaign time should be in addition to personal devotional time.
sentences.chinese: 应安排在个人每天灵修时间外诵读圣经。

sentences.english: Some children with dyslexia might only have one of these symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 有的诵读困难者可能只表现出其中的一种症状。

sentences.english: It is one of the effective means for students to read ancient poems.
sentences.chinese: 诵读古诗文是学生学习语文的一条重要途径。

sentences.english: The clerk was gabbing over the indictment .
sentences.chinese: 书记官在喃喃诵读起诉状。

sentences.english: When I grew up, it was really hard for me because of my dyslexia.
sentences.chinese: 当我长大后，由于诵读障碍，我真的很艰难。

sentences.english: We talked last week about a reading disorder, dyslexia.
sentences.chinese: 我们上个星期已经讨论了说话障碍，即诵读障碍。

sentences.english: To adopt the methodology of reading aloud is an effective approach in teaching ancient poetry.
sentences.chinese: 采用诵读法教学古诗词，是有效的方法。

sentences.english: Of day is morning, the morning is the best time for reading.
sentences.chinese: 一日之计在于晨，早晨是诵读的最佳时间。

definition: to read aloud with expression/to recite/to declaim
to read aloud/to recite rhythmically/to chant/to intone (esp. poems in rhythm)
to study the Confucian classics/to read scriptures or canonical texts
to read out/to recite/to remember sb (while talking about sth else)
to broadcast a lecture, a book reading etc
